validation.password: Password must be at least 12 characters long
validation.positive: This field must be greater than zero
validation.notNegative: This field shall not be less than 0

validation.lessThan: The value must be less than or equal to {target}

validation.metadataName: The metadata name can only consist of letters, numbers and underscores (_)

validation.responsiveMediaValid: Graphics must consist of at least one size
validation.lettersOnly: The value can only consist of letters and underscores (_)
validation.dateBefore: The end date must be before the start date
validation.priceRangesDuplicates: Price ranges shall not contain duplicate thresholds
validation.schemaCheckbox: A scheme cannot be both hidden and required
validation.shippingPointsDuplicates: Point of given name already exists
validation.timeBefore: The end time must be before the start time
validation.couponCode: The coupon code can only consist of letters, numbers, dashes and underscores (_)

VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_STRING: The field value must be a string.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_MIN: The minimum field value must be at least {min}.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_MAX: The maximum field value must be at the most {max}.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_ARRAY: The field value must be an array.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_BETWEEN: The field value must be between {min} and {max}.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_DIGITS: The field value must have an exact number of characters.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_ALPHA: The field value must be alphanumeric.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_DATE: The field value must be a date.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_EMAIL: The field value must be an e-mail.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_FILE: The field value must be a file.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_REGEX: The field value must match the pattern.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_SIZE: The field value must be a certain size {size}.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_UNIQUE: The field value must be unique, and the specified value is already used elsewhere.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_BOOLEAN: The field value must be a boolean.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_URL: The field value must be a valid url.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_UUID: The field value must be in the uuid format.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_PASSWORD_LENGTH: The password length must be the minimum length of the value {min}.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_DISTINCT: During the validation of the array, the indicated value cannot repeat itself.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_IN: The field value must be one of the values ​​provided by the validator.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_PRESENT: The field value must be present, but may be empty.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_INTEGER: The field value must be an integer.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_FILLED: The field value cannot be empty if present.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_ALPHA_DASH: The field value must be alphanumeric and can contain hyphens and underscores.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_MIMETYPES: The file extension must be one of those listed in the validator.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_BEFORE_OR_EQUAL: Date must be earlier than or equal to value {when}
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_REQUIRED_WITH: The field value is required and cannot be empty, if other indicated fields are filled and not empty
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_APP_UNIQUE_URL: The application link is identical to the link of one of the applications that is already installed.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_ATTRIBUTE_OPTION_EXISTS: There is no option for the specified attribute.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_CAN_SHOW_PRIVATE_METADATA: The user does not have permission to view metadata_private.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_CONSENT_EXISTS: There is no consent for such an ID.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_DECIMAL: The field value must be a number.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_ENUM_KEY: The field value must be an existing key in the given Enum.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_EVENT_EXISTS: The field value must be an existing Event.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_OPTION_AVAILABLE: The option exists in the schema and is available.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE_OPTIONS: The product must have this option.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_PRODUCT_PUBLIC: The public value of the product must be true.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_PROHIBITED_UNLESS: The field should be empty or absent until the indicated field {field} has a given value {value}.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_REQUIRED_CONSENTS: The user must accept the required consents.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_SHIPPING_METHOD_PRICE_RANGES: The minimum delivery charge must be 0.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_AFTER_OR_EQUAL: Date must be later than or equal to value {when}.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_ENUM_VALUE: The field value must be one of the value provided by Enum.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_REQUIRED_WITH_ALL: The field value must be present and cannot be empty if the other specified fields are present and not empty.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_GTE: The field value must be greater than or equal to the value of field {field}.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_APP_UNIQUE_ID: App with given url is already installed.
VALIDATION_ERROR.VALIDATION_PHONE: The field value must be a valid phone number.

CLIENT_ERROR.CDN_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_CHANGE_ALT: You cannot change alt attribute of this image.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_FAILED_TO_UNINSTALL_APP: Failed to uninstall the application. Failed response from app.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_ASSIGN_INVALID_PERMISSIONS: Assigning invalid permissions, there is no difference between all possible permissions and assigned ones.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_ADD_APP_WITH_PERMISSIONS_USER_DON: Can't add an app with permissions you don't have.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_APP_INSTALLATION_RESPONDED_WITH_I: Application info responded with invalid status code.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_ADD_APP_WITHOUT_REQUIRED_PERMISSI: Can't add app without all required permissions.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_ADD_PERMISSION_APP_DOESNT_WANT: Can't add any permissions application doesn't want.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_TOKEN_INVALID_OR_INACTIV: The token is invalid or inactive. Try to reset your password again.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_DISCOUNT_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Discount type is not supported, discount value cannot be calculated.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_CANNOT_APPLY_SELECTED_DISCOUNT_TY: Cannot apply selected discount type to order.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_NOT_ENOUGH_ITEMS: There is not enough items to order the product.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_CREATE_ROLE_WITHOUT_PERMISSION: Can't create a role with permissions you don't have.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_UPDATE_ROLE_WITHOUT_PERMISSION: Can't update a role with permissions you don't have.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_DELETE_ROLE_WITHOUT_PERMISSION: Can't delete a role with permissions you don't have.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_GIVE_ROLE_THAT_USER_DOESNT_HAVE: Can't give a role with permissions you don't have to the user.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_REMOVE_ROLE_THAT_USER_DOESNT_HAVE: Can't remove a role with permissions you don't have from the user.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_ONLY_OWNER_GRANTS_OWNER_ROLE: Only owner can grant the owner role.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_ONLY_OWNER_REMOVES_OWNER_ROLE: Only owner can remove the owner role.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_ONE_OWNER_REMAINS: There must always be at least one Owner left.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_DELETE_WHEN_RELATION_EXISTS: Element can't be deleted, because it has relations.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_CHANGE_CANCELED_ORDER_STATUS: Cannot change the status of a cancelled order.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_INVALID_PAYMENT: Payment's signature doesn't match correct signature.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_NO_REQUIRED_PERMISSIONS_TO_EVENTS: Client has no required permissions to perform any action on this event.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_DOESNT_HAVE_TFA_TYPE_SELECTED: Client does not have 2FA type selected.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_TFA_CANNOT_REMOVE: You cannot remove 2FA yourself in this way.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_ONLY_USER_CAN_SET_TFA: Only users can set up Two-Factor Authentication.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_WEBHOOK_USER_ACTION: Only user can use this method on this webhook.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_WEBHOOK_APP_ACTION: Only application can use this method on this webhook.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_NO_ACCESS_TO_DOWNLOAD_DOCUMENT: No access to download the document. Client has no permission or he is not the buyer.
CLIENT_ERROR.CLIENT_STATUS_USED: Can't update or remove status that is currently used in order
CLIENT_ERROR.NO_ADMIN_PERMISSIONS: You don't have permissions to log in to the admin panel
